mapper.select: select * from (select a.*, rownum rn from (select * from t_user order by reg_dt, userid) a ) where rn between (#{page}-1) * #{pageSize} +1 and (#{page})* #{pageSize}
mapper.update: update t_user set userNm = #{userNm}, userAlias = #{userAlias}, pass = #{pass}, picturePath = #{picturePath, jdbcType=VARCHAR} where userId = #{userId}
mapper.insert: insert into t_user values (#{userId}, #{userNm}, #{userAlias}, #{pass}, #{reg_id}, sysdate, #{picturePath, jdbcType=VARCHAR})
